key_risks: Data privacy concerns due to past practices and privacy policy allowing sale of personal data
Regulatory compliance risks under GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy laws
Data accuracy issues potentially undermining client trust
High competitive pressures in the digital analytics market
controversies: Scrutiny over data collection practices, including the acquisition of the Stylish browser extension
Potential reputational damage from data accuracy issues
social_issues: Ethical concerns over user privacy and data collection practices
governance_issues: Reliance on third-party data sources introducing risks related to data quality and compliance
